titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to establish a national standard to prohibit the operation of motor vehicles by intoxicated minors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/13/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to withhold specified percentages of apportionments of Federal highway funds to States that have not enacted and are not enforcing, by October 1, 1998, a law that makes unlawful throughout the State the operation of a motor vehicle by an individual under age 21 who has a blood alcohol concentration of .02 percent or greater.
